content: this beret pattern is provided in three sizes but it is fully customizable with instructions provided on how to increase or decrease the diameter of the beret to suit the wearer the pattern is easy enough for a beginner knowledge of single_crochet required since the diameter of the beret is more important than gauge any bulky weight #5 yarn or even worsted weight #4 doubled will work so pick up a ball of your favourite yarn or use some from your yarn stash and start crocheting
